name: hapitest2
description: The second attempt at learning the hapi.js api

scripts.resetdb: npm run unmakedb  && npm run makedb &&  npm run migratedb
scripts.droprole: psql -d postgres -c "DROP ROLE IF EXISTS testuser"
scripts.unmakedb: npm run dropdb  && npm run droprole
scripts.createrole: psql -d postgres -c "CREATE ROLE testuser WITH PASSWORD 'p' NOSUPERUSER NOCREATEDB NOCREATEROLE INHERIT LOGIN"
scripts.makedb: npm run createrole  && npm run createdb && npm run uuiddb

author: Villagers
